The decorative helm (white) is a reward from the Castle Wars minigame and can be bought from Lanthus, the custodian of the arena for 40 Castle wars tickets. The helmet has similar stats to a mithril med helm, and requires level 20 Defence to wear.

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room, as part of the Castle Wars armour (2) set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-3+0
 Defence bonuses
+10+11+9-1+10
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Date Changes
14 July 2021
(update)

The medium helmet's ranged attack bonus has been increased from -1 to 0.

(update)

The item was made available to free-to-play players.
